评论详情: I wear a size 8 or medium in every brand I purchase …this size 8 did not compare to other brands I routinely purchase. Size up if ordering  as the material felt great and I wish would work
Ran small
Pants were purchased as a birthday gift and turned out to be too small. Shows to be outside of return window so now I am stuck with too small pants 🙁 bummed.
I am 5' tall and these fit perfectly on me, as I was looking for a full length pant. I bought the camel color and looks just like the photos. I usually wear a medium and these are a good fit.
I usually wear a small 2/4 and the xs was still too big. So bummed because the quality of these look much higher than the price and I love them.

I am about 27"-30" at the waist and 40" at the hips. I bought M. It gets past my hips. In reference to height, I'm 5"0' and 27" inseam. I purposely got M because I wanted the pants to hit my ankles and get it past my hips. However. It's too wide at the waistline and I added a piece of elastic. Getting it to be more fitted at the waistline and past my hips. Fabric is soft. My biggest disappointment is that it's FULLY UNLINED. The color is excellent. Just as pictured. Measurements are precise. A small may have fitted me better at the waistline. But I take into account that I wanted length and my hips to get through.

I wanted to love these pants the fit is great. They are very flattering and surprisingly stretchy. They are high waisted and easy to put on. They are nice and thick and have a soft wool like texture which make them quite tear resistant but the one downside is the button. I wore these probably 5 times and after that fifth wear the button fell off. Thankfully I was able to repair it but it was annoying and beyond the return window after it happened. Other than that I love the pants. I would have given them 5 stars if it wasn’t for the button issue
Very comfortable and true to size. High quality.

They actually fit nicely. Only problem is they came in very wrinkly and steaming did not work so I had to use an iron. The fabric is kind of a velvety texture and even though I ironed on the inside of the fabric, it’s still left marks on the outside.

评论概述: Like others have said they have an odd fit
评论详情: There are darts in the front that end in a conspicuous place. It bulges out right in the groin area. Love the fabric feel, texture weight. Wish they could have done a better cut.
These are so cute. The crop length is perfect for my 5'4" height. The fabric is a nice thick weight but not too thick. I ordered the brown and I'm ordering another pair in black.

Waist runs small. Wanted to keep these. Really impressed with the fabric and quality. Super cute style with the cropped length. The size of the waist compared to the width of the rest of the pant was really odd. I usually wear a size 4 but bought a medium. The waist was very snug. If I went up to a large, I think they would look like I was wearing a sack. So returning these
Fabric is so soft and just the right thickness. I love the fit and the color. They run a tad small so I ordered the next size up but kept the smaller ones since I’m losing weight!

评论概述: Loved old material, disappointed with last purchase
评论详情: I had these pants in a larger sized and loved them.  The material was awesome and fit was great.  I had to get a smaller size and I ordered the brown, black, and grey.  The brown and black are the same thick material but the grey is cheaply made sweatpant material.  I’m super disappointed and am going to order again in hopes I get a good batch because these are the perfect pants.
I liked the pants very much, except they run very , very small. Size up at least 2 sizes when ordering.

I was very happy with these pants; they are very soft with a great, high-quality material. I bought them for a costume but have worn them several times as part of my daily outfits. While I love them, the button fell apart very quickly (just fell out of the hole it went through on the pants) and now I have to try to fix it myself. Also, the sizing is a little awkward; the medium is too baggy and the small is perfect except for a slightly too-small waist. I was able to stretch it out a bit though and I’m able to wear it.
i love these anthropology dups! They are so soft and comfy. They fit great and look great! Great quality and great price
Los pantalones son hermosos, la tela suave y abrigados. La talla perfecta

The material is super soft and the pockets are great, but the fit is not quite right. 5’4”, 180lbs, hourglass, and normally a 12. I ordered the XL. These are very tight around the waistband (which is not my waist as the high-rise indicator had led me to believe). I’d say these actually sit somewhere between mid and high rise, which if you have any sort of lady pouch, is right across it. Not ideal. They also are baggy everywhere else except that waist band. If the rise would be correct and the material size consistent throughout the pant, these would be amazing. As it stands, they are just okay.
These run very small.  I'd be returning them but I missed the return window.  You'll definitely want to size up at least one size.
although woolen what i love is they look and feel like felt

评论概述: Not as stiff as I expected
评论详情: I wanted these to be stiff wool like material but they were a lot softer and floppier? Than I wanted. Honestly felt like pajamas or something. They fit okay but I would have liked them an inch or so longer on my frame as it hit me at a weird place on my calf. Just not for me but I could definitely see them working for other body types
I almost didn't because of some of the negative reviews but so glad I did. The material is very soft. There is no stretch but they fit very well.
It fit my waist, but they ended mid-calf. I wanted them to be high ankle

I’m 5’2” 119lbs and I bought a small but exchanged for an XS because the waist gapped open in the back. The waist has no give, so if you have a smaller waist but wide hips, it will fit you well. The XS was almost too snug in the crotch but after sitting in them for a bit, they did stretch. They are exceptionally warm and somehow make me look tall so basically magic. I could see how they wouldn’t fit all body types but if you’re short and athletic with a short torso and smaller waist they are a great fit.
I love these pants. They are classic stylish pants. They are timeless. Perfect for work, dressy or casual attire. Good style never goes out of fashion.

Very nice pants, thick, quality material.  5'5 and they came just above ankles (like in the pic) and are adorable with black boots. Ordered a large (165#). Little tight in the hips (42") as it pulled the pockets. Returned. Really liked these, though!
Same
I love these pants! They are made of a nice, soft fabric and are lined. They fit me perfectly! I’m 5’5”, 125#.
Es bonito y buena calidad
My wife is 5'1" 120lbs and got size small. They are the best material for winter/fall in Ohio and great fit. Cute with boots !
Loved the color, but the fit/quality wasn't great -- bought them in black too but ultimately returned.

The pants were not worth the money I spent on them. The stitching on the pants was very sloppy. I thought the pants looked off because the where wrinkle but I had them steamed and the still looked off.
Awful stretch knit fabric. Not structured Office suiting pants as described. Returned and had to go outside of Amazon.
These pants are very high quality. Silky inside and super soft outer material. Ankle length. Cute with boots!
Good winter pants. Wish there were more colors, specifically winter white.

BUYER BEWARE! I ordered these in black and received some ridiculous Halloween costume quality piece of cheap rag. It has no pockets like on the picture, the material is very thin synthetic fabric of cheapest quality you can imagine. On top of it smells like mothballs and has a cut tag looking like it has been worn. And all this for $43. Ridiculous. Don’t buy, save yourself trouble.

These culottes type pants are of great quality-  they are a bit on the heavy side ( some lining in the top area ) but suitable for winter wear. Unfortunately not really a good fit for me- on the small side  I wear a med. for pants and these were small in the waist.
These are nice pants quality looks good. Bought an extra large, as per measurements. Fit was way to tight. Material feels like fuzzy felt.

Although the tag on the slacks said "US size XXlarge", they were not equal to the US XXlarge. Their size was more like a US16 or US18. I could not even get them on past my hips! I will give them to charity!

These pants are awesome! Definitely a new go-to in my wardrobe! Deep pockets are a win for carrying my phone and essentials. The material is soft and just the right thickness for fall to winter. Roomy enough to layer thin leggings underneath when it gets colder. Easy to wash, and I prefer hang drying. Super cute and a great deal! I might have to get another pair!

The waist doesn't have any stretch. The legs do. I LOVE the material very soft and on the thicker side. Great color kinda brown/orange. The legs were a bit short for me, and the waist was too small, I could button but would not be wearable in size small, I'm about 145lb at 5'4ish. I'm going to try a medium and hope!
I love the fabric and length of these pants.  They feel like flannel, very nice for winter.  I recommend them highly!

I am 5’3, ordered a large the fit is good I weighed about 135. The seat while wearing the pants, measure 27 inches, and around the waistband while wearing them measured 37 inches. The waistband actually goes around my high hip and not my actual waist. The pants are gorgeous. I usually wear between a small and a medium. But I ordered based upon their hip recommendation and the pants were perfect.
Material is amazing but length is shorter than pictures.
I live in North Idaho and the winters get cold .  These pants are perfect for the weather
These fit perfect, good quality and look dressy; can be dresses yp or down.

评论概述: Beautiful thick and soft wide leg crop pants
评论详情: These are such beautiful thick and soft wide leg crop pants!  I love the detail on the front pockets (see picture).  The color of these is also beautiful and perfect for Fall. The color is just as pictured. These will look great paired with brown boots and various types of tops dressing the pants up or down.  I am usually in between a medium and large size in pants and ordered a medium based on Amazon's suggestion, but they were too tight in the waist for me. I love the pants so much that I immediately ordered a pair in large and I can't wait to receive and wear them!  I paid a little over $40 for these pants and I think they are worth the investment because they appear to be high quality pants that will last me a long time.
Great quality,  beautiful color and great fit!!!

These pants are great!  Perfect heavier weight for fall and winter. Super soft to the touch. They aren’t lined but they don’t need it. I bought a XXL and I’m a 12-14. They are a little big so I’m going to reorder in an XL and see how they fit.  Once I figure out my correct size I’m ordering all three colors … that’s how great they are!

评论概述: Perfect Business Pants for Fall/ Winter
评论详情: These are exactly what I needed for colder weather business meetings. The cut is very flattering. The material is thick and soft. Very high quality.

The good - they have 4 wonderfully deep functional pockets, they seem well made, and the size chart is accurate. The medium - they are mid rise, which is not a terribly flattering or comfortable cut, but it's fine. They are somewhat short, but I like that because they show off my boots, but may look terrible with flats or heels The bad - the fabric is a fuzzy, velvety sort of stuff. They are soft and probably warm, but absolutely not wool. They are sort of ultra suede like, which gives them a weird dated look. They are okay, and I plan to keep them, but I wish they had been more accurate about the fabric 😞
My favorites! 10/10

I ordered size small and I’m very happy I did. I wear a size 4 jeans generally and the small fits me perfectly. The waist band hits exactly at my belly button. I really love that they are made from a heavier fabric because they drape really well. I’m curvy and these pants don’t cling to my curves.
These pants run a bit large but still flattering. I'm 5'3 / 135 lbs and I think a small would've fit slightly better. Overall I'm very happy with this purchase.
These pants are very comfortable and have a bit of stretch to them. I will be buying the other colors for work

评论概述: High water britches you can do yoga in
评论详情: They are big and don't ride up on ya. Great for wrestlin in.
Super unflattering cut and fit.

These are absolutely beautiful slacks.  Fit (small) is perfect and weight and drape of fabric is beautiful.  Haven’t washed yet so I don’t know how well they hold up.  I am 5ft so the crop length was perfect full length on me.
Can’t even believe the quality of these pants!  So soft and durable.  I could have sized down, but they work.  I love the texture, color, and fit!
These trousers fit perfectly; top notch quality material. All day compliments on the look. Dressed them up for work but casually worn will work also.
Great quality, super flattering!

评论概述: These pants fit great and are very soft and comfortable.
评论详情: These pants fit great and are very soft and comfortable. I'm 5'4", 150 lbs and I was happy with the X-large. I got the gray and brown. The brown pair were a little longer than I'd like, so I'll have them hemmed an inch or so. Overall, nice pants to wear to the office when I have to show up there.
I’m 5’2 and 106 lbs- fit perfectly! Very cute style and good quality.

评论概述: Bought to wear for style and use for knee office visits
评论详情: Have had trouble walking and thought these would work for knee gel shot office visits without having to undress. Worked like a charm!

Material feels really nice but the pants did not fit me well at all, too tight around my waist and were much shorter then expected. They would be easier to pair with outfits of they were longer. Had to return them
Exceptional texture and height for Petites
Very flattering and right on trend!!!

评论概述: Cute but not as high waisted as I expected
评论详情: Super cute and comfortable but they aren’t as high waisted as I expected.

Love, love the fit of these pants! Didn’t expect them to be that material they are but they look so good. The material is like a super soft micro suede. I’m 5ft and 115 pounds, ordered a small and they fit great.
Was still snug on my thighs. I do have big thighs. Waist was a little big.
These pants are amazing! Very flattering, thick velvet-like material, lined pockets, and over all beautiful pant! Fits exactly as expected! Just buy them!

These pants are high quality. I hope the other colors are too because I’m definitely buying more. I bought the brown in size S. They are just so cute. I’m 5’3.5”, and the coke about 2” above my ankle perfect for boots in winter and sandals in summer
They look just like the picture in person.
These look exactly like the photo.  They are a nice thick wool was material.  Not sure I'd wear this pant in the summer at its a little thick.

Just got these in today and they fit GREAT! I bought a Medium in grey. I am 5'6, 140lb and top/chest heavy, so can't speak for the pear shaped ladies. They are not as high waisted as I prefer, but still hit at a good place on my waist where you can still tuck in shirts with a little room to spare so perfect to wear with a shiny belt.  I will pair them with cute black boots and will probably get another pair - will probably live in these this winter. Perfect for casual or dressy occasions and so much more comfy than jeans! Attached a photo to see the actual fabric - it's really soft!!!!
I would have liked an inside lining
Great quality, great fabric and construction
The material is very cheap. It’s uncomfortable and gives you an allergic reaction like a rash! It was such a disaster. Definately don’t recommend it!

These are foe people with a small waist. The legs are triangle shape — its impossible to get the triangle to go away unless you press them and put a crease in the front. Theres a bug crease next to the seam where theyre folded and even after washing it doesnt soften. So they remain in a bell shape.
Extremely pleased with the quality and fit of these pants. This is my second pair
Read the reviews and decided to size up to a large. They fit perfectly!
Flattering and cute, but keep in mind these are NOT wool or anything close to it. Pretty expensive for the fabric.

评论概述: Not hight waist trouses as described
评论详情: It’s not the high waisted trousers as claimed. The waistline is under my belly button. The descriptions are wrong.
I absolutely love these pants, I also have them in the gray color.
I am a tight 8 and had to get a large. Love the pants. Comfortable and professional looking.

I'm 5' 7", short-waisted, long-legged, no hips, 197 pounds, and I carry most of my weight in my upper body.  I normally wear a US size 16. These pants are a dream come true.  It's like they were especially tailored for me.  I will get them in the other colors too. I don't know how well they will launder.  I understand these were made in Asia and the launder tag is confusing with 3 contradictory care instructions:  Machine Wash, Dry Clean,  Hand Wash.  Wait, WHAT? I guess I'll just post a question to the vendor separately and pray for a (clear) answer.  And they are super soft by the way.  They don't feel like stiff wool trousers.
I love these pants!  They are flattering and warm.  They are very comfortable as well.
The cut was too small even going up one size

I’m 5’5, 155lbs, and pear-shaped. I got these in large, and other than being a little loose in the waist, they fit like a glove (and the waist is nothing a belt won’t fix). And guys, I LOVE these pants. I bought them kind of on a whim — I’m in the midst of losing 20lbs and needed something inexpensive to tide me over while I’m in between sizes — and if not for the fact that I have 10lbs left to lose, I’d be buying these in every color. Fingers crossed they’re still available when I’m done losing weight, because these are going to be my new go-to pants for real.

I love these pants! I wore them for pictures and got a lot of compliments on them. They are extremely comfortable. I was impressed with the material. They are very soft, pretty warm, and don’t wrinkle. I came back and bought them in black I liked them so much.

评论概述: Too small and not high waisted.
评论详情: Too small and not high waisted. No stretch. More like hip huggers.
Looks nice.
These pants are true to size. Very flattering.
The material is great runs really small
So cute and comfy and quality material and I love the color but I wish she was a little longer,..but like I’m super tall and with boots or high tops they still work. Ankle shoes looks stupid tho :/

These pants are super cute & comfortable, but if you're an hourglass or pear shape, you'll likely experience some back gap. I'm 5'6" 165lbs and am normally a size 10-12 pant. I'm glad I went for the XL even with the loose waist; the L would not have fit my thighs/butt. With the right belt they will work just fine though. I also agree that they're more of a mid-rise pant, and they fall right above my ankle. The fabric is really soft and thick which I like, but noting that, I'll probably store them until it cools down outside.

Great look, but the fabric is kinda cheap. Feels very polyester’y, a thin velour that is more appropriate for costumes. The fit is good though, and the waist is nice and high without making the trunk look flat like so many other mom jeans do.

评论概述: Beautiful and quality - great for petites!
评论详情: Was very happy to find some wider-leg pants that worked for someone petite like me! For reference, I'm 5' and ~95lbs, and the SM fit me more comfortably in the waist and length than the XS (the length of the SM hit right around the ankles, like pictured). These pants are really beautiful and I'm pleasantly surprised at the  excellent quality -- the fabric is thicker and it seems well-made with stitching, etc. Because of the heavier/non-breathable fabric, I think these would be better for cooler weather, like autumn and winter.
I like it. It fits nicely.
